name: Volumizing Conditioner for Fine, Dry, Thinning Hair
about: What it is: A volumizing conditioner that plumps and thickens strands for body, fullness and weightless hydration with black seed for fine to medium hair types...Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, and Curly..Hair Type: Fine and Medium..Hair Concerns:- Dryness.- Thinning.- Volumizing..Key Benefits: - Gives weightless volume and bounce.- Detangles and conditions strands.- Adds hydration and softness..Highlighted Ingredients:- Black Seed Extract: Promotes hydration and has elasticity-restoring properties..- Onion Juice: Promotes healthy hair growth and strengthens strands for less breakage..- Amla Extract: Conditions and naturally provides UV protection for healthy strands...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Enriched with potent Ayurvedic ingredients, black seed extract brings bouncy fullness while restoring elasticity and replenishing moisture to strands and amla extracts add shine and softness for a soft, hydrated and voluminous mane...Fragrance Description: This volumizing conditioner has a majestically warm spice blend of Indian saffron and nutmeg, paired with midnight rose Damascena and Indian jasmine sambac, with a touch of incense and sandalwood for an unexpected richness and depth...Clinical Results: Based on 33 participants using the Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner for 2 weeks:.- 100% said they saw all-over fullness.- 97% agree it enhances fullness and volume.- 97% said it cleanses without drying hair and scalp.- 91% saw instant weightless volume..Clean at Sephora: Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Black Seed Extract: Promotes hydration and has elasticity-restoring properties. .-Onion Juice: Promotes healthy hair growth and strengthens strands for less breakage. .-Amla Extract: Conditions and naturally provides UV protection for healthy strands...Water (Aqua), Cetearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Chloride, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-2 Stearate, Cetearyl Glucoside, Stearamidopropyl Dimethylamine, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Glyceryl Stearate, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Coconut Alkanes, Coco Caprylate/Caprate, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Allium Cepa (Onion) Bulb Extract, Trigonella Foenum-Graecum Seed Extract, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Nigella Sativa Seed Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Calendula Officinalis Flower Extract, Pisum Sativum (Pea) Sprout Extract, Stearyl Alcohol, Behentrimonium Methosulfate, Wheat Amino Acids, Soy Amino Acids, Polyquaternium-7, Xylitol, Panthenol, Arginine HCI, Threonine, Serine, Isomalt, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Benzyl Alcohol...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- After using the Volumizing Shampoo (sold separately), apply at least 3 pumps of product to strands from mid-lengths to ends..- Wait for at least one minute..- Rinse thoroughly and gently squeeze out excess water.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve seen a lot of divisive reviews about scent, personally I like it. It’s definitely the scent of incense, like and earthy Nag Champa. reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am such a fan of this brand! I have the hair oil and a volume spray and they were already working wondering on my very fine flat hair but as soon as I added the shampoo and conditioner to the routine it is volume for dayyys! Love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner was sent for free from the brand and I have been using it for a couple weeks and it works amazing! It also smells so good and leave my hair so soft! This and the shampoo are s great duo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry, thinning hair, and I've recently started to use this volumizing conditioner along with the shampoo, and I'm hooked!! It makes my flat hair much more volumized, and it also feels a lot more hydrated. Plus, the scent is insanely good, and it lasts soooo long! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer using beauty products including haircare with natural ingredients, but do not always find that they work in terms of benefits. This brand, Fable and Mane however has surprised me with its high quality, natural botanical extracts and nourishing oils that it uses in its haircare products. My lifeless, thin hair has been brought back to life with a ton of volume, softness and vibrancy that my hair hasn't had for years! This is a haircare brand I definitely want to start trying more haircare products from!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair really needed something to help with dryness and thinning. It’s wavy/curly, and this conditioner has been a game-changer! It leaves my hair feeling soft, hydrated, and easy to manage without weighing it down. I use it along with the shampoo, and together they make the perfect combo for my hair!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand for my hair. I have curly hair and this stuff makes my curls look so good. Not to mention the smell is so amazing. I have the whole line of these products. Definitely one of my favorites.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo and conditioner set has been so vital to my hair transformation it has elevated and completely revived my hair’s appearance it suddenly has so much bounce and life to it ! i keep getting questions about what i’m using

reviews.review_text: If you have stressed and damaged hair, this conditioner is going to be great for you. It provides moisture as well as volume without leaving any residue.  Leave for 5mins and wash off for a silky smooth look.

reviews.review_title: Great for my thin, fine hair

reviews.review_text: This hair conditioner is so great at adding a lot of softness to my hair as well as boosting the voice of my hair. I love how much better my hair feels and looks after using this. My hair is full and manageable and looks so shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have thin, dry-ish hair so I’m always looking for moisturizing and volumizing products. This conditioner makes my hair feel soft and smooth but not weighed down. It smells great, just wish the bottle was bigger!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin

You only need a little bit to blend into your hair and it smells great. I love that its clean ingredients, means its great for the whole family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have medium weight, straight and very long hair that’s oily at the scalp and dry everywhere else. The conditioner leaves my hair looking full, shiny and easy to comb through. I’ve been wanting to try Fable & Mane for a while now and so glad I finally got to! reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fine thinning hair is loving this rich thick conditioner. Its so thick and smells amazing. My hair is super soft and smells amazing all day long. After a couple weeks of use my hair seems thicker and less frizzy.

reviews.review_text: I am no fan of the scent of this one, but it does my hair look voluminous and shiny. It feels great. I also love that my hair feels softer when using it. I definitely recommend it to anyone wanting something that doesn’t weigh your hair down.

reviews.review_title: From dry and lifeless to soft and voluminous!

reviews.review_text: I cannot say enough good things about this conditioner for my flat and wavy hair! It totally revives it back from the dead! It also smells really nice so I think this will stay in my go-to wash routine for a very long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin

It also has a very calming scent and helps me save so much time on wash days by making my curls more manageable.

The scent is mild and pleasant, and it doesn’t leave any residue behind. I have dry, frizzy hair that is line and falls flat easily and this conditioner is a nice daily conditioner that moisturizes my hair while providing volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This new Volumizing  Conditioner for Fine ,Dry, Thinning hair works amazing. I’ve been using this for over a month now looks and my hair feels great. My hair has much more volume and not flat anymore. It leaves your hair feeling softer and silky.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is a perfect addition to the shampoo! It adds the moisture back into my hair and makes it so soft and silky. It also gives such a voluminous blowout look when I style my hair after using this. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off the scent is amazing, it gives me herby greenhouse vibes which I love. I also love all the good for you ingredients in this! Now for me I find that a lot of conditioners are the same so my hopes weren’t too high with this. After shampooing with their Volumizing Shampoo I applied the Volumizing Conditioner and it performed well in the shower leaving my hair soft and tangle free. After air drying, I did feel like I noticed a little less frizz, but it wasn’t anything drastic. Overall I think this is a great product, but I didn’t see a huge reason to choose this as opposed to other conditioners.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice conditioner it's light weight. It made my hair feel soft and silky. My hair was easy to brush out. My hair looks healthier and has more volume. The conditioner has a really nice scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: No issues with packaging. Smells okay, nothing crazy good! Does detangle hair nicely. No issues with hair falling out but also don’t notice a big difference in thickness. Doesn’t make hair appear greasy. Overall- good, not great

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm loving the Fable & Mane volumizing conditioner along with the shampoo. It keeps my hair smooth, shiny, bouncy, and smelling great. My hair has been feeling dull and lifeless after having my babies, so I wanted a volumizing conditioner to help with that, and this product is working wonders! I'm in love with the botanical scent, and it lingers until the next wash. Love the pump packaging too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the voluminzing conditioner for a while now and I have been loving how this makes my hair feel!!! Helps with frizz and makes my hair feel so soft!! I love how it smells and it makes my hair look so shinny!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cable & Mane’s Volumizing Conditioner leaves my hair feeling soft and hydrated without weighing it down. It adds just the right amount of moisture, keeping my hair light, smooth, and full of volume all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fable & Mane HoliRoots Conditioner is a rich, hydrating conditioner that leaves hair feeling soft and smooth. Packed with nourishing ingredients like coconut and turmeric, it works well to detangle and restore moisture, especially for dry or damaged hair. The formula is lightweight enough not to weigh hair down, yet effective at adding shine and manageability. The subtle, calming scent adds to the overall experience. For those with thicker or coarser hair, it provides excellent hydration, but it might be too heavy for those with fine hair looking for volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how soft this conditioner makes my hair feel. It leaves my tangled crazy hair much calmer. I dont need a crazy amount to make a difference. I love the volume I get from this duo. My hair is left feeling soft and shiney.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so happy to get my hands on the shampoo and conditioner! I am really loving this brand and how their products are making my hair feel even after one use! I love that they disclose what type of ingredients are in their products so you know what to expect! Keeps my hair, feeling hydrated and tamed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this formula because it's not too heavy for my thin fine hair at the same time nourishing and makes it smooth. I love the fact that it doesn't weigh my hair down. The scent however is a miss

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The first time I used it, I am in love with this conditioner because it doesn’t leave my hair feeling heavy after using. It moisturized and restored my hair. The amount of frizz in my hair has decreased.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have to shout out this hydrating conditioner—it’s been amazing for my dry hair !  It feels so rich and creamy, but it doesn’t leave my hair feeling heavy or weighed down. After rinsing, my hair is super soft, detangled, and feels so much more hydrated.  It leaves my hair looking shiny and healthy without any greasy residue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The fragrance matches the MahaMane Smooth & Shine Hair Oil and adds a rich, luxurious feel to the experience. I love how its lightweight texture made it easy to distribute through my long, permed hair while being able to restore moisture and shine. It hydrates each strand and makes detangling a breeze. After using it, my hair feels noticeably softer, looks plumper, and has a healthy, voluminous bounce. I highly recommend using both the shampoo and conditioner together for a fully nourishing, transformative hair care experience. This conditioner empties faster than the shampoo for me so I always keep a stock of it. This line has easily become one of my all-time favorites and is one that will have a permanent place in my haircare routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The volumizing conditioner for fine, dry, thinning hair has definitely nourishes my hair. This product really does give my hair some weight and volume making it look fuller. I’ve been pairing it with the shampoo and the hair mask. I can definitely feel a difference when using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner has completely transformed my hair! After using it, my hair feels incredibly soft and smooth without losing any volume. It adds just the right amount of moisture, leaving my hair manageable but still lightweight. I love that it doesn’t weigh down my  hair, and it gives me that perfect bounce and shine. Paired with the shampoo, it’s a powerhouse duo for voluminous, healthy looking hair. The scent is so calming. It is an absolute must have!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine and dry hair, I am so excited to try this volumizing conditioner from Fable and Mane. This conditioner is so hydrating and gives a beautiful shine and glow to my hair, making it soft soft and fuller volume without weighing it down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this shampoo and conditioner set for a few times now, I do like the conditioner more than the shampoo. The conditioner makes my hair feel soft and the scent is nice and fresh. I have medium hair and I do notice a slight thickness to it when using this combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, straight hair that can look limp if I don’t use the right products. Fable & Mane’s Volumizing Shampoo & Conditioner really stand out for me because they’re lightweight but still manage to give my hair a fuller, more voluminous look. The shampoo leaves my scalp feeling clean but not stripped, and the conditioner is hydrating without making my hair greasy. After each wash, my hair feels smooth, soft, and noticeably more voluminous without losing its natural shine. It also has a lovely, subtle scent that lingers just enough.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner has been amazing! I have super dry hair from many years of bleaching so I’m picky about find a super hydrating conditioner and this one is unbelievable it leaves my hair feeling so soft and smooth!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Conditioner is one of the headset things to find for my hair that is thin and usually oily, but this conditioner I have found to be the best!! It leave my hair leaving soft and it smells soo good! I will recommend this one to my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous ingredients and wonderful formula. I have really dry and tangled hair and this instantly softens it. It also doesn’t make your hair greasy which is super important! I also love the fresh scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this conditioner even though I’ve only used it a few times! I love that the ingredients aren’t full of unnecessary additives that so many other products can be. My hair feels soft to the touch and I love the smell. Will be using again and I would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great addition to Shampoo from the same hair line that is perfect for fine and thinning hair like mine. It gives me some hydration but does not weigh my limp hair down and helps keep the volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’m honestly always skeptical about products that claim they add volume to your hair. this shampoo has proven me wrong! My hair feels silky smooth and looks so much fuller, in addition to using the shampoo that goes with it. I will for sure be repurchasing this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This smells so gooood! I love the scent of this! Doesn’t really last a long time on the hair though. I do feel like this made my hair really soft. I do have thicker hair so I’m not sure if this was the best product for me as i do feel slightly weighed down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is perfect paired with the shampoo and my hair has been really loving it! This hydrates my hair perfectly and leaves my hair volumized in a really natural way. The floral scent is so beautiful and the scent really lingers on the hair. My scalp sometimes gets oily but I had no issues with this conditioner. It doesn’t weight my hair down either. I really love the volumizing shampoo and conditioner and really recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff does not make my hair as silky smooth as other products have but I do think the ingredients are a lot better than other brands so I am willing to compromise with that! Also it does have a smell!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner leaves my hair soft and shiny. It has a good ingredient list. However, it does have a strong floral scent that I am not fond of. So if you are sensitive to fragrance, you might not like it either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Has the perfect amount of moisture and hydration for my fine hair. I love the scent and it’s not overpowering at all. Did not weigh my hair down at all either. Hair looks nice and healthy after using.

This conditioner works wonders for my hair, I actually find it to be a total game changer! My hair has been super dry and on the thinner side lately, but after using this conditioner I did find myself having an overall improved hair state. No more dryness, my hair is kept contained and makes my hair smell amazing! My new go to conditioner!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic conditioner for thin hair. I love the packaging too, the pump is so convenient. It smells really nice and it’s a lighter formula so it does not weigh down fine here. Used with the matching shampoo, my hair looks amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Fable & Mane Volumizing is such a nice, lightweight conditioner. I love that it is not heavy and doesn’t weigh down my fine, thin hair. This is also another great smelling product from the brand that leaves my hair soft and manageable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is perfect. I have fine but thick hair so it’s moisturizes without weighing my hair down for lots of volume. I love the scent of this conditioner too. My hair is left so silky and shiny!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using the Fable and Mane Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner together this past week and I'm so happy with the results so far! This lightweight hair conditioner detangles and softens my hair while also giving it a bouncy appearance!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is next level, I absolutely love how and not only gave my hair a good amount of volume, but it also kept my hair extremely moisturized as well. For reference my hair is dry, bleach, and fine so I need all the help I can get.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner has been really good for my wavy hair that has been thinning out. I’ve been using it for almost two weeks now and I really enjoy it. It’s volumizing and hydrating. It also smells pretty good too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This really gave such a boost to my hair volume. I can totally see a difference after just the first use. My hair also feels softer and smooth to the touch. I have medium hair so I feel like I kind of struggle with my volume. I definitely, love this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The conditioner has a very light consistency. It is definitely for thin hair. It’s not for thick hair. It will not work for you. I gave it to my mother and it worked wonders. She loves it. And their scalp oil it’s so good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is truly that girl for fine and thin hair. The way it creates volume in my hair is unmatched. I love that it creates a beautiful shine while still adding volume. I also love that it has clean ingredients so I know what I’m putting on my hair is safe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair has been loving the addition of this conditioner into my routine. My hair type is slightly wavy, and fine. I am always looking for more volume, so I’m so happy that this formula truly does leave my hair looking more full. It leaves my hair soft and shiny, and I will definitely continue to keep this in my routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has a milky gel texture. It is almost unscented to me. I apply it from the middle to the top of my hair after washing with the volumizing shampoo. It washes off easily and leaves my hair a smooth touch at the end. Again, I wouldn’t say I see a big difference between the volumes but it still works well to me. I normally get my hair done with the comb and hair dryer for volume after all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finding products that can help give my fine, thin, long locks life without weighing it down can be tricky. This was my first time trying Fable and Mane and after this volumizing shampoo/conditioner introduction, it certainly won't be my last. This conditioner feels like every other in the shower. Simply apply mid lengths to ends, let sit and rinse. Don't let the every other conditioner feel fool you though. This is amazing. The scent I would describe as spicy deliciousness (unisex imo). After using this, my hair is so soft and almost completely free of tangles. Paired with the shampoo, my hair is left so shiny and has the appearance of being fuller/thicker even when simply air dried. Like what? Where have you been all of my life? reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started using the Fable and Mane Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner, and I am absolutely delighted with the results. This duo promises fuller-looking hair, and it certainly lives up to that claim. The Volumizing Shampoo is fantastic. I use three pumps, as recommended, and the lather it creates is rich and luxurious. The scent is soothing, making my shower experience feel like a spa retreat. The Ayurvedic ingredients, like fenugreek seeds and amla, really do wonders for my hair. After using the shampoo, my hair feels thoroughly cleansed but not stripped of its natural oils. It has more body and a beautiful shine. The Volumizing Conditioner is the perfect follow-up. After rinsing out the shampoo, I apply the conditioner from the mid-lengths to the ends of my hair. The black seed extract and amla in the formula make my hair feel incredibly soft and bouncy. I leave it on for a minute before rinsing, and the difference is noticeable. My hair is fuller, more elastic, and has a healthy shine that lasts throughout the day. Overall, the Fable and Mane Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner duo is a must-try for anyone seeking volume and shine. The silicone-free, high-performance formula with potent Ayurvedic ingredients leaves my hair looking and feeling fantastic.

reviews.review_text: I recently used the Fable and Mane Volumizing Conditioner and am eager to share my experience. The conditioner is packaged in a sleek, attractive bottle that pairs well with the shampoo. Its fragrance is consistent—a delightful mix of botanical and earthy tones that makes conditioning a treat.  My hair is fine and tends to lack volume at the roots. I need a conditioner that can add body without weighing down my hair.  Upon applying the Fable and Mane Volumizing Conditioner, I was impressed by its creamy, smooth consistency. It spread effortlessly through my hair, providing excellent detangling and hydration without feeling heavy. After rinsing, my hair felt incredibly soft and smooth, with no residue or greasiness left behind.  Once dry, my hair felt light and full of volume. The conditioner worked perfectly with the shampoo, giving my hair a noticeable lift and bounce. My hair stayed soft, manageable, and shiny throughout the day, with a subtle, pleasant scent that lingered.  In summary, the Fable and Mane Volumizing Conditioner exceeded my expectations. It added volume and softness to my hair, leaving it feeling nourished and healthy without any heaviness. I highly recommend it to anyone with fine hair seeking a conditioner that delivers both volume and hydration.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have straight fine hair and had a lot of post-partum hair loss because of this I am always looking for hair care products that can help with volume. I used the conditioner after using the hair oil and shampoo from the same brand and my hair looked really nice! Had a nice shine to them and volume. I've fallen in love with my hair all over again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this volumizing conditioner after the shampoo. It’s my first time using Fable & Mane and I recommend it. It made my hair soft and shiny and the scent is quite nice too. I let it sit in my hair for about 5 minutes to let it do its magic. Will be using this regularly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been loving this conditioner! All of the Fable and Mane products I have tried smell so good! The scent lingers until the next wash. I love pairing this conditioner with the coordinating shampoo and the leave in conditioner while my hair is still wet. These products leave my hair feeling bouncy and hydrated.

I recieved this in exchange for a post. But honestly it’s very good ! It has a floral scent that I love it. Almost smells like Delina . And it does get my hair, a lot of texture and volume. It’s perfect to use before giving yourself a blowout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know if this is my all time favorite, but it’s not a bad product. Mostly I noticed that it kept sinking into my hair so I kept needing to add a bit more to really coat my hair. It did rinse out nicely and I did notice more lift than normal to my hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been loving this volumizing conditioner it really does make a difference, I love that it makes my hair look healthier and feels really soft after, I also love that it has amla extract it helps condition and naturally provide uv protection for healthy hair strands !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My hair is wavy and tends to be dry . I need a conditioner that is good to detangle my hair . This conditioner does a good good to add moisture and detangle my hair . It also did work with shampoo to add volume to my dull hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fable and Mane's volumizing conditioner works wonders for those with thin hair. I adore how full and lively my hair appears after just one use. It also adds a silky texture and has a delightful scent that's wonderfully subtle

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Fable & Mane’s Volumizing Conditioner is fantastic. It leaves my hair feeling soft and full of life without weighing it down. The light, pleasant scent is a nice bonus. Definitely a keeper for anyone needing extra volume.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The conditioner is lightweight and contains nourishing ingredients. It rinses away easily but it didn’t help with smoothing my hair. I don’t feel that it improved the look or feel of my fine, thin hair. I also am not a fan of the fragrance, it’s pretty strong and definitely sticks around.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Luxurious smell! Omg i just instantly fell in love when i smelled it! I have the same brand shampoo ad well and i like to leave this conditioner for at least 3 min on my hair. After either a blow dry or air dry, i can see a difference! Hair looks more visibly fooler and it’s more shiny! And smells just soooo good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this conditioner it left my hair, nice and smooth however I don’t think that it’s worth the expensive price tag for how much I needed to use in order to get a good condition. I really like the ingredients that they’ve infused in this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner plumps and volumizes my fine hair nicely. I have a lot of hair but it can fall flat easily, especially by the roots. This product gives it a lift and nice body. I have wavy hair and it creates a smooth texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This condition is absolutely outstanding. The way it smells…luxurious! The way it instantly heels my hair and makes it smooth and shiny. I can’t say enough wonderful things about this product. I will certainly repurchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted something that would not dry my hair and give back the shine and volume to my hair. I decided to give the the volumizing conditioner in conjunction with the volumizing shampoo and they did wonders for my hair.  I saw a noticeable lift and volume to my hair.  And I absolutely love how it smells.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner smells really good! I have been using it only for a little bit now and my hair feels so clean. I have been struggling with thinning on my hair and this shampoo and conditioner is supposed to target that. Excited to see more results from it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair type is wavy and this conditioner helped give me so much volume in my hair! I also love the way it is scented it smells so good and i get many compliments on the way my hair smells! it leaves my hair less oily too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My hair has started to becoming thinner and losing alot of volume recently out so i definitely needed some help. I enjoy the brand Fable and Mane and was so excited to try the Volumizing conditioner. It smells great and left my hair feeling clean and without tangles. I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is absolutely amazing. It hydrates my hair and leaves it feeling sooo soft. I have thin fine hair and have trouble with conditioners weighing down my hair but this product my hair just feels so nourished and silky!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’m always looking for a good conditioner since I have dry hair because of all of the color treatments this conditioner is so nourishing and makes your hair so soft ingredients packed in. It are truly one of the kind I love this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this voluminous conditioner is a game-changer. It provides just the right amount of moisture without weighing my hair down. My hair feels soft, looks thicker, and has great bounce. It also detangles easily and has a lovely scent. Perfect for adding volume while keeping hair smooth and manageable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is very lightweight. It rehydrated my ends and gave a fullness after drying. I usually am afraid to use more then a quarter size for conditioner application because it always ways my fine thin hair down. This is the complete opposite from using the conditioner. My hair afterwards felt so soft and luxurious even more shiner then before my hair over the last week looks so much nicer and bouncy. Definitely a good addition to my hair routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dealing with fine hair usually means I have to choose between volume and nourishment. But with this volumizing conditioner, that old compromise is history. This conditioner feels luxurious from the moment it touches my hair. It has this rich texture that's super indulgent but never weighs me down. I like to leave it on for a minute or so, and when I rinse, my hair feels crazy silky and light, but it also has this fullness that I didn't expect. No residue, no heaviness—just happy hair. Honestly, this conditioner's become a total staple for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. The conditioner works well to help detangle my hair, making it easier to brush when drying. It makes my hair feeling soft. Just the like shampoo, the bottle is kinda small.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is sooo good!! I love the conditioner . I have very thin hair now after my baby and my hair is also dry. Table and mane always has good products and this is no exception. It leaves my dry hair happy and soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this and let me tell you it left my hair so soft and did not weigh down my hair like normal conditioners do. The smell is amazing and so much product for your buck! 10/10000 recommend!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner is great! I originally got the holiroots hair oil and it smells incredible. This conditioner smells just as incredible so I use it in tandem with the shampoo as well. Love it so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing conditioner for my dry hair. I use a grape size amount and it makes my hair feel luxurious and easily manageable. The packaging is beyond cute & I love how it looks in my bathroom. My flat hair feels moisturised but not heavy and weighted down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great conditioner for anyone with thinning, dry hair. Mine looks like hay, lol. I love everything Fable & Mane but this product especially rocks. Super soft and silky hair and great for us mouse girls.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this conditioner. I’ve been using it combined with the matching shampoo. Unfortunately after having two babies, my already thin hair is thinning even more at my part and this conditioner has helped tremendously with volume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don’t know how to feel about this. I love the shampoo but I just don’t like it in conditioner form. I have super curly, dry hair. Definitely helps with volume but I need more hydration than this gives

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine and thin hair and a lot of conditioners can weight it down. This one doesn't at all! It makes my hair feel soft and smooth but not heavy which is what I am looking for. I also really enjoy the scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've had a wonderful experience with Fable & Mane Volumizing Conditioner. Enriched with Ayurvedic ingredients like black seed extract and amla, it adds bouncy fullness, restores elasticity, and replenishes moisture to my hair. The conditioner leaves my hair shiny, soft, and voluminous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo has helped my hair so much. My hair feels softer and full of volume.  The amla extracts have added more shine and smells so good. A little bit goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This conditioner has transformed my hair. It gives me the softest smoothest hair of my life! It smells so good, reminds me of a luxury perfume! I use this in combo with the shampoo & it gives me the best hair of my life!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have very fine hair that definitely needs some volume, but I tend to avoid many products that claim to volumize because they often weigh my hair down. I wanted to try this conditioner in hopes that this could be a good alternative to volumizing mousse and the like. I absolutely love it. I feel that it’s hydrating , but not too heavy or oily and in combination with the conditioner, I do feel as though my hair has been given some volume, but still feels very lightweight. It has a little more body and a little at the root!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fable & mane has the best condition ever. I love how it’s gives shine to my hair but plus volumes. I usually use right after shampooing and keep it for 5 mins on hair and rinse it. Love how it’s gets my hair to soft and silk.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this condition. There’s nothing that makes my hair more luminous looking. I’m so thankful for Fabel and main for making such a rocking product. Thank you so much for sending it to me. Please make more products like this because it is such a dream come true for the flat haired Gurleys.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, thin, long hair, and I've been using the Fable and Mane Volumizing Conditioner for a week now. It has made my hair softer and shinier than before. My hair looks healthier, and there is less breakage when brushing. My hair detangles easily and appears more voluminous. The subtle scent is pleasant, and the natural ingredients have left my hair hydrated and healthy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this conditioner. It adds a good amount of hydration and volume to my hair. I let it soak in for about 5-10 minutes before I rinse and each time my hair is silky, smooth, and had a ton of volume!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent of this conditioner and its consistency. I use it every other day and let it sit for two minutes to maximize penetration of the ingredients to my scalp. The scent reminds me of an in-home hair massage treatment, with hints of jasmine and spices. So far, this helps keep my thinning hair looking a bit fuller.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair gets greasy super fast (like the very next day) so I really needed a volumizing conditioner that actually works and this does help prolong the volume in my roots for an extra day or two. I use it with the fable & mane shampoo. I love the fenugreek scent and the ayurvedic ingredients that are known for strengthening hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the shampoo and conditioner are both lovely. after 1 use, I decided that I really like them both. my hair feels soft and doesn’t have a residue on it. a good staple in my routine!! these were sent by gable and mane
